attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED 😡😡😡
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app with the intent of getting closer to the best president. But instead I was greeted with an ambush for my credit card number. I skipped that step but I came back because I THOUGHT I was going to be able to talk to my president. And then I was sent a message it was a petition for a loser DEMOCRAT. 

I can’t believe I was supposed to sign it however I got past that and got another message asking for a donation to BERNIE SANDERS. I was disgusted by the thought  I can’t believe I thought I would be supporting our best president yet but was reminded of DISGUSTING DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST!!!!!!😡😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: mistake
attributes.review: i downloaded the app but as soon as i opened it i was 🌞blinded🌞 by a horrid orange creature with disgusting teeth. i started to convulse and seize, foaming at the mouth. i was rushed to the hospital, but no doctor could figure out what was happening. i was eventually cleared, and went home. due to habit, i went straight to my phone and it opened the most recent used app. this app. i tried to shield my eyes but i couldn’t in time. i started to have explosive diarrhea almost immediately, and my bones started to get squishy. i couldn’t dial 911 so i just projectile launched my runny poo onto my walls and on the floor. i was later diagnosed with “rapist/racist radioactive brain damage”, caused by this app. do not download. i am currently in the hospital taking many medications because of this. i can no longer walk, and will be on a wheelchair the rest of my life.

attributes.title: LITTLE ORANGE MAN SCARY CHEETO CHEETO CHEETO CHEETO🤩🥳👎🐷🎉👁👄👁🦟🦗🦟🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.review: DO NOT download this app it took for ever to download and then when u opened it I was horrified to what I saw there was a loading screen full of Karen’s and Bob’s asking for the manager and chanting “WHERE IS THE MANAGER”while circling trump in a carrot costume rubbing peanut butter all over the Karen’s and Bob’s, I was truly scared with What happened my dog saw this screen and threw up an orange Cheeto and the Cheeto started to RUN AT ME, then u won’t believe what happened the Cheeto ate my dog and HE BACAME A RUNING CHEETO I was very scared for my life I deleted the app right away. Never again🐷🐹🐽🦁👠🥾🧚🏻🧚🏻‍♂️👨‍🦲👨‍🦲😪😵😮🤐

attributes.title: Crashes Phone
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app in an attempt to keep up with the president and his policies better than just seeing what is shown on the news in social media. 

Since the first time I opened the app, my phone is now crashing. I cannot get send or receive text messages, make phone calls, open apps. My phone will not even stay on. 

I had to delete the app and my phone began to work properly again. I would not recommend this app if you enjoy using your phone.

attributes.title: This app killed my dog
attributes.review: I got the app to see what the organ gets was up to but as soon as I got the app wired things happened. I noticed that things would go missing replaced with small Trump 2020 stickers. I thought nothing of it at first but as the days went on more import things went missing. Like my dog and grandma. I called the cops but they were busing tear gassing peaceful protests. I had no choice but to go to the White House. When there I realized that our president is not alive. He died awhile ago and we can’t elect a dead guy for president.

attributes.title: An ugly cheeto🌸🦋✨❤️🌸
attributes.review: This app is terrible once I download it there was a big Cheeto on the screen and I don’t like Cheetos I like hot Cheetos when I was taking my pet dinosaurs to the pet shop he tried to eat my phone because there was a big Cheeto on the screen i don’t want to see a giant one on the screen and also this app crash’s a lot I think that Apple should take this app off of the Apple store and because this app is already at 1.2 stars It should be DELETED and taken off the Apple store and never come back TRUMP 2020 But on a gravestone✨

attributes.title: absolutely TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is so bad. not only has it been crashing on me it deals with a racist , ignorant pig. it is the worst app i have ever come across to. i can not explain or put into words how scary and bad this app is. it crashes on me ALL THE TIME. it keeps going in and out and sometimes i feel like they’re watching me. i hear voices through the app too , and donald trump the worst to ever exist has his face all over the app. definitely a ONE STAR. please delete this right away, i can’t have my kids see this app ever again 🥰🤢

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER🤬🤬🤬🤬😡😡🤬😡😾😾😾😾😾😾😾
attributes.review: ok so first off when i fist downloaded this app it completely shut down my phone then after like an hour of having it the government hacked my phone and tracked me then the stole my baby brother out of his crib and took him to the white house and did scientific experiments on him then we found him took him back and then THIS APP blow up my phone and then i had to get a new phone which i’m a little short on money so that was NOT a good thing anyways this app is horrible and you should NEVER get it 🧚😾😾😾🤬🤬🤬🤬💫💫💫

attributes.title: WHY
attributes.review: For the next 30 minutes after opening the app, little trumps ran around the screen and wouldn’t let me click on any other apps. I got very frustrated and yelled which led to the phone BURNING LIKE FIRE! I dropped the phone because now I have a third degree burn. My dog licked the phone and now has a third degree burn on his tongue and is starting to turn orange. The last thing I know, I’m holding my hurt dog who know looks like a dog version of trump while being booed in the streets. Then I see the review request on my screen for the app.

attributes.title: No♥️
attributes.review: After downloading and opening the app, I was met by an orange lookin dude 🍊 and he called me a “terrorist”! Idek how he knew that because I wasn’t even wearing my hijab. He then told me that if I don’t send him the best plate of shawarma and falafel, he will force send me back to Iraq to work for him by looting oil 😦. UNBELIEVABLE 🤭and DOSGOSTANG🤮 orange Cheeto President!!! He also said that if I don’t vote for him in the 2020 election, he’ll send secret agents to rip off my hijab in public🤭. Jokes on him tho, I can’t vote 🤣 and he should know that I’m gonna hot glue that thang on my head from now on whenever I go out 😝!
